mapper.sql: b.id, b.create_by AS "createBy", b.create_time AS "createTime", b.del_flag AS "delFlag", b.update_by AS "updateBy", b.update_time AS "updateTime", b.name, b.default_role AS "defaultRole", b.description, b.data_type AS "dataType"
mapper.select: select from sys_user_role a left join sys_role b on a.role_id=b.id where a.user_id=#{userId}

select a.id, a.create_by AS "createBy", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.update_by AS "updateBy", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.role_id AS "roleId", a.user_id AS "userId" from sys_user_role a where a.role_id=#{roleId}
SELECT DISTINCT rd.office_id FROM sys_role_menu rd WHERE role_id IN ( SELECT ur.role_id FROM sys_user_role ur WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} )
